comments:
200412142000

Steps to reproduce:

1) load the ui.tests/data/editor plugin
2) in window->preferences->file associations associate *.txt with the editor
from this plugin
3) open a text file using this editor.
4) remove the plugin (editor should disappear)
5) load the plugin again
6) in window->preferences->file associations associate *.txt with the editor
from this plugin again
7) hit ok.  An error will occur.  The following stack is in my log.

EditorDescirptor.getId() should be a cached value, although that doesn't really
address this problem.  We're holding onto an invalid descriptor.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 0 2004-12-15 11:20:40.166
